---
title: Contact us
---

<form action="https://formspree.io/f/xdopvppv" method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
 <div class="form-group">
  <label for="FormControlInput1">Email address</label>
  <input type="email" name="_replyto" class="form-control" id="FormControlInput1" placeholder="name@example.com">
 </div>
 <div class="form-group">
  <label for="FormControlSelect1">Select a reason</label>
   <select class="form-control" id="FormControlSelect1" name="reason">
   <option>Suggestions</option>
   <option>Issues</option>
   <option>Cooperating in AFLIBER</option>
   <option>Other</option>
   </select>
 </div>
 <div class="form-group">
  <label for="inputAddress">Subject</label>
  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="inputSubject" name ="subject" placeholder="Subject">
 </div>
 <div class="form-group">
  <label for="FormControlTextarea1">Your message</label>
  <textarea class="form-control" id="FormControlTextarea1" rows="3" name="message"></textarea>
 </div>
 <button class="btn btn-primary shadow-none float-right" id="form-btn" type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
